Class ItemManager

java.lang.Object
ItemManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IItemManager
public class ItemManager extends Object implements IItemManager
Manages a collection of items using a Doubly Linked List for sequential access and iteration, a Binary Search Tree for fast lookups by ID, a Priority Queue for viewing items by priority, and a Stack for undoing deletions. Implements the IItemManager interface.

      public ItemManager()

  • Method Details

    • addItem

      public boolean addItem(int ID, String name, String description, String category, int priority)
      Adds a new item to the system. The item is added to the DLL, BST (ID -> DLLNode), and Priority Queue.
      Specified by:
      addItem in interface IItemManager
      Parameters:
      ID - the unique identifier for the item
      name - the name of the item
      description - a description of the item
      category - the category of the item
      priority - the priority of the item
      Returns:
      true if the item was added successfully, false if an item with the same ID already exists.

    • viewItemById

      public void viewItemById(int ID)
      Displays the details of an item specified by its ID. Retrieves the item from the BST.
      Specified by:
      viewItemById in interface IItemManager
      Parameters:
      ID - the ID of the item to view.

    • viewAllItems

      public void viewAllItems()
      Displays all items in the system, ordered by priority (highest first). Iterates through the priority queue.
      Specified by:
      viewAllItems in interface IItemManager

    • itemExists

      public boolean itemExists(int ID)

    • updateItem

      public void updateItem(int ID, String newName, String newDescription, String newCategory, Integer newPriority)
      Updates the details of an existing item identified by its ID. Only non-null new values are used for updating. The priority queue might need re-ordering if priority changes.
      Specified by:
      updateItem in interface IItemManager
      Parameters:
      ID - the ID of the item to update
      newName - the new name (if null, name is not changed)
      newDescription - the new description (if null, description is not changed)
      newCategory - the new category (if null, category is not changed)
      newPriority - the new priority (if null, priority is not changed)

    • deleteItem

      public void deleteItem(int ID)
      Deletes an item from the system based on its ID. The item is removed from the BST, DLL, and Priority Queue. The deleted item's DLLNode is pushed onto the undo stack.
      Specified by:
      deleteItem in interface IItemManager
      Parameters:
      ID - the ID of the item to delete

    • undoLastDeletion

      public void undoLastDeletion()
      Undoes the last deletion. Pops an item from the undo stack and re-inserts it into the DLL, BST, and Priority Queue.
      Specified by:
      undoLastDeletion in interface IItemManager

    • searchItemByName

      public DLL<Item> searchItemByName(String name)
      Searches for items by name and prints their details. Iterates through the DLL.
      Specified by:
      searchItemByName in interface IItemManager
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the item(s) to search for.
      Returns:
      a doubly linked list of items matching the search criteria, or null if no items found.

    • searchItemByCategory

      public DLL<Item> searchItemByCategory(String category)
      Searches for items by category and prints their details. Iterates through the DLL.
      Specified by:
      searchItemByCategory in interface IItemManager
      Parameters:
      category - the category of the item(s) to search for.
      Returns:
      a doubly linked list of items matching the search criteria, or null if no items found.

    • saveToFileHelper

      public void saveToFileHelper(Item item, boolean isFirst) throws IOException
      Helper method to save a single item to the "Items.csv" file.
      Parameters:
      item - the item to save.
      isFirst - true if this is the first item being written (overwrites file), false to append. Note: the boolean parameter name in original code is `isFirst` but used as `!isFirst` for append flag, which is slightly confusing. Javadoc reflects its usage.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during file writing.

    • saveToFile

      public void saveToFile(DLL<Item> Dll) throws IOException
      Saves given items to "Items.csv". Iterates through the items in the DLL and uses the helper method to write each one. The first item overwrites the file, subsequent items are appended.
      Specified by:
      saveToFile in interface IItemManager
      Parameters:
      Dll - the doubly linked list of items to save
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during file writing.

    • loadfromDB

      public void loadfromDB()
      \ Loads items from the database into the items list. This method retrieves all items from the 'items' table and adds them to the items list. If the table is empty, the items list will remain empty. If an error occurs during retrieval, it prints an error message and the items list will be empty or partially filled. This method is called during the initialization of the ItemManager to populate the items list.

    • closeDB

      public void closeDB()
      Closes the database connection.
